channel.title: Sponsor on PyCon Pune Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sponsor on PyCon Pune Blog

item.title: Welcome Microsoft
item.description: Glad to announce Microsoft as our sponsor for PyCon Pune 2017. Thanks @Microsoft for supporting PyCon Pune 2017. Register for PyCon Pune 2017 https://pune.pycon.org/registration/

item.title: Welcome Red Hat
item.description: Glad to announce Red Hat as our sponsor for PyCon Pune 2017. Thanks @RedHatSoftware for supporting PyCon Pune 2017. Register for PyCon Pune 2017 https://pune.pycon.org/registration/
